title: Web developer
description: Self-taught of {{age}} years, I have been passionate about web development and UI/UX for {{sinceDate}} years.

projects.title: Case studies of personal projects
projects.subtitle: Here is a selection of my personal projects, if you click on one of them you can read a case study about it.

descriptions.Tempus: A simple yet featureful pomodoro in the tray/menubar
descriptions.Ribbon: A bookmark manager app with reminders and pinned bookmarks
descriptions.Export GitHub Stars: View / Sort / Export your starred repositories.
descriptions.Gelbooru Client: A material client to explore an image board.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I am passionate about front-end development and web design, user experience and accessibility I develop Human-centered projects.

I'm also passionate about open-source, I am a contributor to several projects and I'm also passionate about teaching (talks, articles, mentoring).
